mapper.insert: insert into store_information(store_name, store_describe, store_location, dong, lat, lng, member_usercode) values(#{store_name}, #{store_describe}, #{store_location}, #{dong}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{member_usercode})
mapper.update: update store_information set store_grade = (select ( store_grade + #{class_review_point} ) from (select * from store_information) as tmp1 join class_information as tmp2 on tmp1.storecode = tmp2.store_information_storecode where tmp2.classcode = #{class_information_classcode}), store_grade_cnt = (select ( store_grade_cnt + 1 ) from (select * from store_information) as tmp3 join class_information as tmp4 on tmp3.storecode = tmp4.store_information_storecode where tmp4.classcode = #{class_information_classcode}) where storecode = (select tmp5.storecode from (select * from store_information) as tmp5 join class_information as tmp6 on tmp5.storecode = tmp6.store_information_storecode where tmp6.classcode = #{class_information_classcode});
